title: Dev UI /endpoints does not show all of my endpoints
body:
### Describe the bug

In dev mode, when I go to `/q/dev-ui/endpoints`, I do not see my routes (onle the `/q/*` routes)

Is it a bug ? Or do I need to add a configuration to show the routes ?

Thanks

### Expected behavior

All of my routes are displayed in `/q/dev-ui/endpoints`

### Actual behavior

Only the `/q/*` routes are displayed

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

Quarkus version : 3.8.2
